content: a crochet pattern that will fit the entire family with this digital download you can make a stylish and practical bucket hat to fit anyone in your family the pattern includes directions for multiple sizes and the included link to the youtube video explains all parts of the pattern lion brand 24/7 cotton dk yarn 3 5 oz/100 g - 273 yd/250 m - 100% cotton - category 3 light dk yarn - 1 1 1 1 2 2 skeins sizes xs s m l xl 2x band dia 19 20 21 22 23 24 inches hook f
